content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy We offer a range of study options including foundation science courses, flexible undergraduate degrees, postgraduate taught degrees and postgraduate research degrees. You will learn in a vibrant and stimulating environment with teaching that is research-led, ensuring you're at the cutting edge and prepared for a wide range of careers. Want to study a science degree but did not take the right A-levels or slightly missed the mark? Our Foundation Degrees will help. Gain an understanding of a science you love and train for a future career in various industries or academic research Study a masters degree in science (MSc) to give you a leg up in your career. We will give you more knowledge and more training in a specific area that you are passionate about. Explore an area of Life Sciences that you love with our MRes and PhD opportunities. Nottingham Life Experience what life's like at Nottingham, including sports, events, culture, shopping and dining. Open Days Book your place on an open day or use our virtual open day website to have a look around. Fees and Finance Find out more about tuition fees, bursaries and scholarships.
